Package jade.core.messaging

Class MessagingProxy

java.lang.Object
jade.core.SliceProxy
jade.core.messaging.MessagingProxy
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessagingSlice, Service.Slice, Serializable
public class MessagingProxy extends SliceProxy implements MessagingSlice
The remote proxy for the JADE kernel-level service managing the message passing subsystem installed in the platform.
Author:
Giovanni Rimassa - FRAMeTech s.r.l.
